00028 #define _LNP_PACKETS_H_

00038 #define LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH    (128 + STRING_SIZE_LENGTH)
00039 
00042 #define LNP_FUNCTION_NAME_MAX_LENGTH    (128 + STRING_SIZE_LENGTH)
00043 
00046 #define LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH           \
00047                 (140 + MPINT_SIZE_LENGTH + MPINT_SIGNAL_LENGTH)
00048 
00052 #define LNP_K_LENGTH                    32
00053 
00057 #define LNP_MIN_PADDING_LENGTH  4

00062 enum llp_packet_ids {
00063         LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_REQUEST, 
00064         LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_RESPONSE,
00065         LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE,               
00066         LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE_OK,    
00067         LNP_DATA                                
00068 };
00069 
00073 #define LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_REQUEST_MAX_LENGTH                       \
00074                 (4 * sizeof(u_char) + 2 * sizeof(net_id_t) +\
00075                 LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH)
00076                 
00080 #define LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_RESPONSE_MAX_LENGTH                      \
00081                 (sizeof(u_char) + 2 * sizeof(net_id_t) +        \
00082                 LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH + LNP_K_LENGTH)
00083                 
00087 #define LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE_MAX_LENGTH                                     \
00088                 (sizeof(u_char) + 2 * sizeof(net_id_t) +        \
00089                 LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH + 2 * LNP_K_LENGTH)
00090 
00094 #define LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE_OK_MAX_LENGTH                          \
00095                 (sizeof(u_char) + 2 * sizeof(net_id_t) +        \
00096                 LNP_FUNCTION_NAME_MAX_LENGTH + LNP_K_LENGTH)
00097 
00099 #define LNP_BROADCAST   1
00100 
00101 #define LNP_UNICAST             0
00102 
00106 typedef struct {
00108         u_char major_version;
00110         u_char minor_version;
00112         u_char transmission_mode;
00114         u_char public_key[LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH];
00115 } lnp_public_key_request_p;
00116 
00120 typedef struct {
00122         u_char public_key[LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH];
00124         u_char encrypted_k[LNP_K_LENGTH];
00125 } lnp_public_key_response_p;
00126 
00130 typedef struct {
00132         char ciphers[LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];     
00134         char hashes[LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00136         char macs[LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00138         u_char encrypted_k_1[LNP_K_LENGTH];
00140         u_char encrypted_k_2[LNP_K_LENGTH];
00141 } lnp_key_exchange_p;
00142 
00146 typedef struct {
00148         char cipher[LNP_FUNCTION_NAME_MAX_LENGTH];      
00150         char hash[LNP_FUNCTION_NAME_MAX_LENGTH];
00152         char mac[LNP_FUNCTION_NAME_MAX_LENGTH];
00154         u_char encrypted_k[LNP_K_LENGTH];
00155 } lnp_key_exchange_ok_p;
00156 
00160 typedef struct {
00162         u_char *padding;
00164         u_char protocol;
00166         u_short timestamp;
00168         u_char *data;
00170         u_short padding_length;
00172         u_char *mac;
00173 } lnp_data_p;
00174 
00178 typedef union {
00180         lnp_public_key_request_p public_key_request;
00182         lnp_public_key_response_p public_key_response;
00184         lnp_key_exchange_p key_exchange;
00186         lnp_key_exchange_ok_p key_exchange_ok;
00188         lnp_data_p data;
00189 } lnp_packet_content_p;
00190 
00194 typedef struct {
00196         u_char type;
00198         u_char ttl;
00200         net_id_t source;
00202         net_id_t destination;
00204         u_char flags;
00206         u_char *content;
00207 } lnp_packet_p;
